标题: 【1？#Stay】稍等片刻（内含BGM） 本帖最后由 我叫坂本 于 2017-3-31 18:30 编辑 

Stay稍等片刻233这不是同一人唱的了，Zedd（捷德）
他的歌大家应该都听过吧，DJ233Xd

看着照片夺帅是吧，虽然不清晰，喜欢就自己找吧√ 
然而不是他唱的，应该是他写的歌吧xD233，我也不知道
虾米音乐+无翻译http://www.xiami.com/widget/272172232_278707322_235_346_5695c1_457cb4_1/collectPlayer.swf
无翻译：
Waiting for the time to pass you by         
Hope the winds of change will change your mind         
I could give a thousand reasons why         
And I know you and you've got to         
Make it on your own but we don't have to grow up         We can stay forever young         
Living on my sofa drinking rum and cola         Underneath the rising sun         
I could give a thousand reasons why         
But you're going and you know that         
All you have to do is stay a minute         
Just take your time         
The clock is ticking so stay         
All you have to is wait a second        席位@volta薯片~
